import React from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import $ from 'jquery' const AdminLogin = () => { const navigate=useNavigate() function login(e){ e.preventDefault() navigate("/") } function openAdminPage(e){ //Preventing the reload e.preventDefault() navigate("/adminPage") var profile = document.createElement("h3") var nam=document.getElementById("adminEmail").value $("#adminLogin").toggle() $("#userLogin").toggle() var adminLogout = document.createElement("button") adminLogout.setAttribute("id", "adminLogout") adminLogout.textContent="Logout" adminLogout.onclick=function(){ $("#adminLogin").toggle() $("#userLogin").toggle() document.getElementById("adminLogout").remove() navigate("/normalPage") } document.getElementById("normalPageRight").appendChild(adminLogout) } return (
Remember me

) } export default AdminLogin
